attributes.action: Condemn ‘Vast Indian false propaganda and fake news campaign against Pakistan’
attributes.additional_details:
India or any country should NOT be allowed to systematically spread false propaganda and campaign to discredit any nation for their own interest. It is IMMORAL & UNACCEPTABLE, & must be condemned to prevent any such things happening again. BBC news confirmed that EU DisinfoLab undertook the investigation and published extensive report on Wed 9th Dec 2020 “It is the largest network exposed...which was used to discredit Pakistan internationally"
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-asia-india-55232432
attributes.background: Plea for discussion and resolution in Parliament to send a clear message to ALL nations in the world that all countries should have a zero tolerance to fake propaganda against any country or race e.g. BBC news article “ The dead professor and the vast pro-India disinformation campaign”.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for regulating the media, including in other countries.
